Comment 2: 
I wonder what is the best way of treating this:
* make escape analysis mark zero-size values as never escaping (then a pointer to it
will be a random address on a stack that may no longer exist)
* make runtime.new always return the same address for size zero
* make runtime.mallogc return the same address for size zero (looks more dangerous to
me).

I would say doing the first two things would make sense.
